Name.txt: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride

Description.txt: This is a work in progress campaign, containing one gameplay map. This is for the FE Actual Lizard game jam. The goal is to make a "single chapter" tactics rpg experience, with a theme based on "Pride". This map contains a small, self-contained story about actualization and realizing your value, aided by embracing queer identity.
